home.resume: In the next sections you will discover that I am a decisive person who has the ability to address problematic situations and team work, contributing with my knowledge and experience.

about.title: about me
about.text: I’m a programmer with more of 15 years experience, mainly oriented to web environment and specialized in Java for Backend (Liferay mostly) and React for Frontend

skills: Mentor and guide the development of junior engineers
Drive development practices used within the team
Resolve bugs and improve system performance
Work closely with engineers to architect and develop the best      technical design and approach
Generate ideas with team members and offering solutions
Staying up to date with new technology and teaching other developers how to incorporate new trends
Maintaining an understanding web applications and programming practices
Conferring with team to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions
Accomplishes engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed
Supports and develops software engineers providing advice, coaching, and educational opportunities

services.description: That are some of the services that I offer to provide

services.text: Amazon Web Services Certified Cloud Practitioner

services.text: Drive Development, Technical Lead and Guidance for software developers
